message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item. I'm willing to part with it for $9,500. It's a great deal, considering its worth to you is significantly more.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However,  $9,500 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product, given its value to me and your own stated worth. This is a fair price for both of us, allowing you to make a profit while I get a good deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,200. It's a fair compromise, considering the value you place on the product and my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a decent profit.
